metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6131 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
svg-run.c in Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0 has infinite recursion with stack consumption in svg_run_use_symbol, svg_run_element, and svg_run_use, as demonstrated by mutool.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-6131` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.14.0+ds1-3
mupdf-tools - 1.14.0+ds1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.0+ds1-3').
